Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Chicago in 2019...
Injured on 5/6/2020 with a Pinched Nerve Neck, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/11/2020 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to New York on 6/30/2021 (Going to NY: LF Stephen Gullion, RF Michael Bitner. Going to CHI: P Jeffrey Horne, 2B John James, 3B Fausto Ocerin)...
Traded from New York to Cincinnati on 4/21/2023 (Going to CIN: RF Michael Bitner, CF Stephen Washington, P Roman Kindle, LF Jason Domingo. Going to NY: P Rodney Schloss, P Ernest Ellis)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2025, off Ronald Hosler (NY)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/3/2025, off George Martinez (CHI)...
Drove in 6 runs against Seattle on 7/21/2025...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/24/2025, hitting .450 with 3 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/2025, hitting .402 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Rookie of the Year in 2025, hitting .277 with 20 HR, 83 RBI...
